page.title: 17THE BERKLEY CENTRE CAMBORNE
page.content: {The Berkley Centre}is a large amusement centre & is a focal point for the teenagers in the Camborne & Redruth area.The Centre renovated from a large building incorperates several shops.The building is still being{modernized}but was opened in 1982.When it was opened the facilities were on{ice skating rink,}an{amusment {arcade,disco}and a{bar.}Now the building has a cafe and another bar. The building has two floors. The age group which it attracts is 14+.The main attraction is the disco and the amusments which{attracts}over {2,000 people}every fortnight.
